game.name: The Hull
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Descend as a Fathomwalker into the ruined depths of a drowned world in this co-op horror dungeon-crawler FPS. Explore the subterrane with friends, uncover forgotten facilities, and survive what lurks beneath. The Hull awaits.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Descend as a Fathomwalker into the ruined depths of a drowned world in this co-op horror dungeon-crawler FPS. Explore the subterrane with friends, uncover forgotten facilities, and survive what lurks beneath. The Hull awaits.
